title: Feed
follow_interface_description: An interface for following new calendars
follow_identifier_description: A place to see your own follow identifier
select_calendar_prompt: Please select a calendar to view its feed

follows.title: Follows
follows.no_follows: You are not following any calendars
follows.auto_repost_originals_help: Automatically share events posted by this calendar
follows.auto_repost_reposts_help: Also share events this calendar has reposted from others

categoryMapping.repostDialogDescription: Some categories from "{{eventTitle}}" are not mapped to local categories. Select the local categories to apply when reposting:

add_calendar_modal.title: Add a Calendar
add_calendar_modal.identifier_help: Enter the ActivityPub identifier of the calendar you want to follow
add_calendar_modal.lookup_error: Could not find calendar. Please check the identifier and try again.
add_calendar_modal.follow_error: Failed to follow calendar. Please try again.
add_calendar_modal.policy_description: Choose whether to automatically share events from this calendar
add_calendar_modal.auto_repost_originals_help: Automatically share events posted by this calendar
add_calendar_modal.auto_repost_reposts_help: Also share events this calendar has reposted from others
add_calendar_modal.mapping_step_description: Map categories from this calendar to your own for automatic categorization of reposted events.

errors.InvalidRemoteCalendarIdentifierError: Invalid calendar identifier format. Please use the format: calendar@domain.com
errors.InvalidRepostPolicyError: Invalid auto-repost policy selected. Please choose a valid option.
errors.InvalidRepostPolicySettingsError: Invalid auto-repost settings: cannot enable reposting of shared events without enabling reposting of original events.
errors.InvalidSharedEventUrlError: Invalid event URL. Please check the event URL and try again.
errors.AlreadyFollowingError: You are already following this calendar.
errors.InsufficientCalendarPermissionsError: You don't have permission to perform this action on this calendar.
errors.FollowRelationshipNotFoundError: Follow relationship not found. The calendar may have already been unfollowed.
errors.RemoteCalendarNotFoundError: Calendar not found. Please check the identifier and try again.
errors.RemoteDomainUnreachableError: Unable to connect to the remote server. The domain may be offline or unreachable.
errors.ActivityPubNotSupportedError: This server does not support ActivityPub federation.
errors.RemoteProfileFetchError: Failed to fetch calendar information from the remote server. Please try again later.
errors.UnknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
